mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice (notice_no, title, content) VALUES(notice_seq.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{content})
mapper.select: SELECT notice_no, title, content, reg_date FROM notice WHERE notice_no > 0 ORDER BY notice_no DESC, reg_date DESC
SELECT notice_no, title, content, reg_date FROM notice WHERE notice_no = #{noticeNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE notice SET title =#{title}, content =#{content} WHERE notice_no = #{noticeNo}
